_sText:
Well i started work on this, but i lost interest.  I have another project i will be working on for Gmod so i prolly wont be getting around to finishing it.  I think its pretty close to the original, as it stands now it has 2 spawns 1 for each team.  

If anyone cares to take the time to finish it feel free, I just thought it was a good start most of the brush work is done, just needs to be textured and weapons/buyzones added.

I think this map may be a better fightyard map, but i suppose that would be up to the final author :)

Hope someone can finish this.



Just a note: this map was not intended to be a "dev texture" map, i use dev textures in the early processes of my maps, its easier to nodraw that way :D
